title: Mission problems
body: Hello there. Im just wondering if i have the only problem with missions. I played one game where we got baron and dragon but it didnt count towards my mission even if i have the worlds icon and we won. However after i restarted the client i now lost all my missions and i cant view completed ones. Let me know if you have the same problem or if it is just some temporary bug please. Thanks // Raikudazhi

replies.body: Yeah i reloged like 2 times then i played 1 more game and reloged again and finally got it back. It works fine now and im able to do the missions once again. Thanks for the help // Raikudazhi
Glad to hear everything is okay now!

Hey, I looked into this for you and do see you've gotten one point each towards completion towards 2 barons and 8 dragons.  You may need to relog your client in case it's not reflecting, but everything looks okay here!
Oh didnt think of that. Thanks for letting me know. I also just got back my missions and will continue to complete then now. Thanks // Raikudazhi :)

Same here for me and my friend, too many players doing that missions so that is problem server is full probably for data of mission and collecting, you cant see them but it counts. I didnt saw and i got icon, now left only one baron to take :D
